title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.22 - Use of poisonous or toxic materials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.22 - Use of poisonous or toxic materials

State Regulations
(a) Sanitizers, cleaning compounds or other
compounds intended for use on food-contact surfaces shall not be used in a way
that leaves a toxic residue on such surfaces, nor in a way that constitutes a
hazard to employees or other persons. (b) Poisonous or toxic materials shall not be
used in a way that contaminates food, equipment or utensils, nor in a way other
than in full compliance with the manufacturer's labeling. The application or
use of pesticides shall be in compliance with Department of Environmental

Conservation regulations. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
